Initializer# init(source:paddingSizeBefore:paddingSizeAfter:edgeMode:)

iOS 12.1+iPadOS 12.1+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.14.1+tvOS 12.1+visionOS 1.0+

```
init(
    source: MPSNNImageNode,
    paddingSizeBefore: MPSImageCoordinate,
    paddingSizeAfter: MPSImageCoordinate,
    edgeMode: MPSImageEdgeMode
)
```
